title: JSON schema for the TypeScript compiler's configuration file

files.description: If no 'files' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files the containing directory and subdirectories. When a 'files' property is specified, only those files are included.

exclude.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'include' property and not the 'files' property.

include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation. If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'.

compilerOptions.description: Instructs the TypeScript compiler how to compile .ts files

charset.description: The character set of the input files.

declarationDir.description: Specify output directory for generated declaration files

emitBOM.description: Emit a UTF-8 Byte Order Mark (BOM) in the beginning of output files.

inlineSourceMap.description: Emit a single file with source maps instead of having a separate file.

inlineSources.description: Emit the source alongside the sourcemaps within a single file; requires --inlineSourceMap to be set.

reactNamespace.description: Specifies the object invoked for createElement and __spread when targeting 'react' JSX emit.

listFiles.description: Print names of files part of the compilation.

locale.description: The locale to use to show error messages, e.g. en-us.

mapRoot.description: Specifies the location where debugger should locate map files instead of generated locations

newLine.description: Specifies the end of line sequence to be used when emitting files: 'CRLF' (dos) or 'LF' (unix).

noEmitHelpers.description: Do not generate custom helper functions like __extends in compiled output.

noEmitOnError.description: Do not emit outputs if any type checking errors were reported.

noImplicitAny.description: Warn on expressions and declarations with an implied 'any' type.

noImplicitThis.description: Raise error on 'this' expressions with an implied any type

noLib.description: Do not include the default library file (lib.d.ts).

noResolve.description: Do not add triple-slash references or module import targets to the list of compiled files.

skipLibCheck.description: Skip type checking of declaration files

outFile.description: Concatenate and emit output to single file.

outDir.description: Redirect output structure to the directory.

preserveConstEnums.description: Do not erase const enum declarations in generated code.

pretty.description: Stylize errors and messages using color and context. (experimental)

removeComments.description: Do not emit comments to output.

rootDir.description: Specifies the root directory of input files. Use to control the output directory structure with --outDir.

isolatedModules.description: Unconditionally emit imports for unresolved files.

sourceRoot.description: Specifies the location where debugger should locate TypeScript files instead of source locations.

suppressExcessPropertyErrors.description: Suppress excess property checks for object literals.

suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors.description: Suppress noImplicitAny errors for indexing objects lacking index signatures.

stripInternal.description: Do not emit declarations for code that has an '@internal' annotation.

target.description: Specify ECMAScript target version. Permitted values are 'es3', 'es5', or 'es2015'.

experimentalDecorators.description: Enables experimental support for ES7 decorators.

emitDecoratorMetadata.description: Emit design-type metadata for decorated declarations in source.

moduleResolution.description: Specifies module resolution strategy: 'node' (Node) or 'classic' (TypeScript pre 1.6) .

allowUnusedLabels.description: Do not report errors on unused labels.

noImplicitReturns.description: Report error when not all code paths in function return a value.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statement.

allowUnreachableCode.description: Do not report errors on unreachable code.

forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Disallow inconsistently-cased references to the same file.

baseUrl.description: Base directory to resolve non absolute module names

paths.description: Specify path mapping to be computed relative to baseUrl option

rootDirs.description: Specify list of root directory to be used when resolving modules

typeRoots.description: Specify list of directory for type definition files to be include

types.description: Type declaration files to be included in compilation

traceResolution.description: Enable tracing of the name resolution process

allowJs.description: Allow javascript files to be compiled.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow default imports from modules with no default export. This does not affect code emit, just typechecking.

noImplicitUseStrict.description: Do not emit 'use strict' directives in module output.

listEmittedFiles.description: Enable to list all emitted files

lib.description: Specify library file to be included in the compilation.

disableSizeLimit.description: Disable size limit for JavaScript project
